article_text:
Photo: Getty

Who says you need insurance to get quality, preventative medical care?

There’s probably a doctor nearby who will take care of you for a mere C-note.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jack Craver
article_metadata.description: An increasing number of primary care physicians are offering direct services to patients in exchange for a flat monthly or annual fee--concierge medicine.

og.title: More physicians bypassing insurers
